text:
(1) Guests en route to excursion steamer, on the occasion of the Police Dept's annual outing for mothers and children. This view taken at East 22nd Street, between First Ave., and Ave. A.
Summer 1936, ?

(2) The Police Department band and several officials, at the head of the contingent.
Summer 1936?
title: Police Department - Outing.
